did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.abstract: The collection consists of a daybook containing recipes, household remedies, and household cleaning tips, both handwritten and clipped from newspapers.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was acquired by Special Collections prior to 2008.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Household Management Ledger was completed in January 2013.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a daybook containing recipes, home remedies, and household cleaning mixtures. Recipes include appetizers, entrees, and desserts; for example, rusks, corned beef, and sugar cake. Hard soap and "family grease soap" are some of the cleaning supplies described. Some examples of the home remedies are ointment, salve, salve for burns, and cures for a felon. Loose clippings found in the volume were removed to a separate folder.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This daybook was found in a box titled Gallaher Family, with two other ledgers: Hite Family Genealogy Notes (Ms2012-083), and Olive Family Genealogy Notes (Ms2012-086). No obvious connection could be found between the three ledgers, so they were processed as separate collections.
